const std::string &  groupName,
int  mode,
int  number = 1 
)

Run animation for a MW-reference. Calls to this function for references that are currently not in the rendered scene should be ignored.

Parameters:
mode,: 0 normal, 1 immediate start, 2 immediate loop
number How offen the animation should be run

void MWRender::RenderingManager::skipAnimation ( const MWWorld::Ptr &  ptr  ) 

Skip the animation for the given MW-reference for one frame. Calls to this function for references that are currently not in the rendered scene should be ignored.

Ogre::SceneNode* MWRender::RenderingManager::mMwRoot [private]

Root node for all objects added to the scene. This is rotated so that the OGRE coordinate system matches that used internally in Morrowind.
